A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This is a great addition to the Star Wars universe. I have been a fan my whole life and think Rian Johnson did a great job. Don’t listen to the negative remarks by some fans\, I saw it 3 times and it it fantastic!! They have done a great job and taken the series in a new direction. Wonderful cinematography\, great action\, good pacing and transitions. It might not be the answers some people were looking for and that is what disappoints them but what they have managed to accomplish is something great for the series overall. Really looking forward to where the series goes from here. Also\, a beautiful nod to the original trilogy and SW lore.
